name: PengPengPinball
description:
PengPengPinball is an unfinished Ludum Dare project.  It tries to combine the genres RPG and Pinball. You can use Space/DownArrow to hit the ball and you can use a,d or the arrow keys to move the flipper. But, there is no End. If the ball is lost, the game is over. =D

24/4/18 First Update:
-Startscreen
-Music
-Enemy Spawner
-HP Bar
-GameOverScreen with restart and quit option

28/4/18 Second Update:
-Enemy-Life-System
-Improved Enemy Spawner
-Some Soundeffects
-Score System (WebBuild differs
to downloadable file)

The link to the Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/pengpengpinball
